note:
Brazilian public interest lawyer and digital rights activist. Director of Data Privacy Brasil.

PhD candidate at the University of São Paulo. Master in Legal Theory and Philosophy of Law at the University of São Paulo. LLM in Comparative Law and Economics at the University of Turin. Alumnus of the Privacy Law and Policy Course of the University of Amsterdam. Former research fellow of the Institute of Cooperative Digital Economy at The New School.

Worked with FGV, InternetLab and Idec.
